import React from 'react' import useStyle from "./styles.js" import moment from 'moment' import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt' import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete' import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz' import { Card,CardActions,CardContent, CardMedia,Button,Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; const Post = ({post}) => { const classes = useStyle(); return ( <>
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tag.map((tag) =>`#${tag} `)}
{post.message} ) } export default Post
